text_block_list.text:
The first "Fantasy Memorial". It will be 
hosted by me, Fortune Telling Obaba.

Oooh, suddenly I have an ominous feeling: ……! Now, all the 
horsegirls, all at once―

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Hey, hey, hey～! Glass! The gate won't open!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: This is a…… locking spell! Is it anything early!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Lower magic, unlock! Go, Elle!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Oh, oh, oh, thank God! Wait, King Uma!
Summon the bear! Get 'em, yahoos!
Uma! Uma-uma!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Oh, absolutely, hopelessly, besieged! But I will break through! 
Condor martial arts!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Taaah! Teeeeeeeeeeeeee! To-Yaaaah!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Geez, geez, my stamina is ……!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Recovery!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Oooh, nice follow-up, Glass! I'm getting a much better idea of 
how to attack this race!

Damn you, you useless bastards! Well, 
then, I'll clean up the mess myself!
Doryaaaah! Eat me! Earthquake!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: I won't let you! Movement at a moment's notice!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Oh, thank God! All at once while we still can!
You can't let her go! This is where it starts!
O pickle stone, come down from the great universe! Meteor！！！！！！

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: I won't let you! Defensive spell "Holy Barrier"!

That's ridiculous! I'll smash you all 
together! The Great Meteor Swarm！！！！！！

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Aaahhhh!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Que? Is this ……? Elle got beat up and 
came to heaven? Sorry about that. ……

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
Elle! What is the matter with you that you are dying! This is no 
time to play at Umadegard.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Totally Susheng!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Not yet!

What, she's back from the dead? I'm going 
to clean out the healer's glass.
Wooooooooooo! Dark celestial bullets!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Aaaaah!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Glass ahhh!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
Elle…… don't come! Uma Musume has more important things to…… than 
the lives of her friends, don't you?

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
Go. We can't help you recover anymore, 
but we're putting our hope…… in you ……

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Glassy!!!!
Ha-ha-ha-ha, while you're doing your sob story, go ahead!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Woah woah woah, I'll wait dace!

What is it? What is this acceleration? 
My skills should be exhausted, but why!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
No skill is needed! No matter what the race, the last magic of 
Uma Musume is always in the end.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: My "leg strength" and "physical strength"!
Gooooooooooooooooooooooo, silly!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Against all obstructions! With the thoughts 
of our fallen friends! What is it that the 
horse girl seeks at the risk of her life?

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Only one thing! VictoryDeath: ！！！！！
(Waaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaah!!!)

Oh, the finish line! Elcon d'Orpasar wins! I can see it clearly, 
even in my grandmother's eyes!
You saw it all along!

Damn!!! I may have lost, but I'm not going to…… become just 
another corpse. Watch me!
